parameters.prompt: synthwave, nostalgic, melancholic, pulsing bass, shimmering arpeggios, vocal chops
parameters.lyrics: [verse] Neon signs flicker like distant stars / Whispered names fade in the dark / Your silhouettes etched on every street / A ghost I follow with tired feet [chorus] Rewind the tape, play it again / Static love with no happy end / Were just pixels in a broken screen / Glitching out in a midnight dream [verse] The arcade hums our favorite song / But the joysticks dead, the coins are gone / High score names washed off the glass / Time dont care if were stuck in the past [chorus] Rewind the tape, play it again / Static love with no happy end / Were just pixels in a broken screen / Glitching out in a midnight dream [bridge] Press escape, but the keys wont work / 8-bit hearts in a system crash [outro] All our data turns to dust / Power downâ€”remember us
